MS.S: Microsoft Azure PowerShell - SQL service cmdlets for Azure Resource Manager in Windows PowerShell and PowerShell Core._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_For more information on SQL, please visit the following: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sql-database/

* Fixed 'New-AzSqlDatabaseExport' and 'New-AzSqlDatabaseImport' to use SQL Authentication with ManagedIdentity without any mandatory password_x000D__x000A_* Added 'MemorySizeInGB' parameter to 'New-AzSqlInstance', 'Set-AzSqlInstance' to enable the creation of instances with flexible memory_x000D__x000A_* Added 'MemorySizeInGB' field to the model of the managed instance so that it displays information about flexible memory instances that are returned by 'Get-AzSqlInstance'.

Microsoft Azure PowerShell - SQL service cmdlets for Azure Resource Manager in Windows PowerShell and PowerShell Core._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_For more information on SQL, please visit the following: https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sql-database/

* Fixed 'New-AzSqlDatabaseExport' and 'New-AzSqlDatabaseImport' to use SQL Authentication with ManagedIdentity without any mandatory password_x000D__x000A_* Added 'MemorySizeInGB' parameter to 'New-AzSqlInstance', 'Set-AzSqlInstance' to enable the creation of instances with flexible memory_x000D__x000A_* Added 'MemorySizeInGB' field to the model of the managed instance so that it displays information about flexible memory instances that are returned by 'Get-AzSqlInstance'.
